name: KOALANARCHY
description:
Pixel Challenge 2018 - Perfect Storm (48h)

A bunch of laboratory koalas escape their sad fate and sow chaos by riding train in a city.
KOALANARCHY is a very simple arena game where you have to ram into the other player's wagons in order to kill him and catch bonus wagons to power up your train and stay alive.

Controls : [Require 2 controllers]
Left Stick - Move around
Back (Select) - Return to main menu
Start - Play / Pause

Made by :
Constantin Liétard
Clara Coolen
Tanguy Gringoire
Alexandre Mairy
Thomas Denis
